nodes.description: 自杀式爆炸发生在医院后门，吸引安保注意力
nodes.support_text: The six-hour attack on the Sardar Daud Khan hospital on Wednesday began when a suicide bomber blew himself up at the back entrance

nodes.description: 伪装成医生的外部武装分子进入医院
nodes.support_text: paving the way for gunmen disguised as doctors

nodes.description: 医院内部人员（包括熟悉环境的实习生）参与袭击
nodes.support_text: attackers already positioned inside the facility –- some of them familiar staff –- launched a killing spree

nodes.description: 袭击者使用枪支、手榴弹和匕首对多个病房发动屠杀
nodes.support_text: launched a killing spree with guns, grenades and knives

nodes.description: 袭击者针对VIP病房和军衔较高的目标实施精准攻击
nodes.support_text: the gunmen... raided nearly every floor, spared two wards... sought out an army general and the relative of a former minister

nodes.description: 袭击造成大量伤亡，包括刺杀病患和近距离枪击
nodes.support_text: the savagery of the assault was characterised by how the assailants stabbed bed-ridden patients, threw grenades into crowded wards and shot people from pointblank range

nodes.description: ISIS宣称对袭击负责，但被阿富汗官员质疑
nodes.support_text: The Islamic State group claimed it was behind the attack via its propaganda agency Amaq

nodes.description: 哈卡尼网络被指为实际策划方，因熟悉医院布局
nodes.support_text: the (Taliban-allied) Haqqani network was behind it

nodes.description: 袭击者与遥控指挥者保持联系，宣称消灭异教徒
nodes.support_text: Some of them were in phone contact with handlers whom they addressed as Mullah Sahib. 'We are killing all the non-believers,' they said

nodes.description: 阿富汗政府承认存在内部人员协助，启动调查
nodes.support_text: This could not have been possible without the help of people inside

nodes.description: 幸存者陈述同步屠杀事件
nodes.support_text: 幸存者陈述同步屠杀事件

nodes.description: 幸存者证词揭露袭击者内线部署
nodes.support_text: 幸存者证词揭露袭击者内线部署

nodes.description: 医院官员将实习生纳入救援统计
nodes.support_text: 医院官员将实习生纳入救援统计

nodes.description: 医院官员引导特种部队执行救援
nodes.support_text: 医院官员引导特种部队执行救援

nodes.description: 国防部坚称仅有30人死于五名袭击者
nodes.support_text: The defence ministry insists only 30 people died at the hands of five attackers

nodes.description: 医护人员向法新社透露细节
nodes.support_text: 医护人员向法新社透露细节

nodes.description: 烧伤中包括怀抱孩子的母亲
nodes.support_text: 烧伤中包括怀抱孩子的母亲
